title: Great, simple free app without ads
comment: Does exactly what's needed imo, lots of different widget sizes avaiable which is important. Attractive design schemes also. People have complained about the user interface/settings, and true, the colour and design customisation is completely visual with no textual explanation, but anyone with any perseverance should be able to work out how to customise the colour scheme and look by a bit of trial and error. Very quick and simple to use, which I find is crucial with a to do list.  OK, you can't re-order the items but I don't find that a big problem, you can easily overwrite if you need to put an item to the top of the list, say.  Deleting items from the list or ticking them off (while still showing) is both easy with just two touches (one to get into list edit more, shown on the right illustrative picture, and another to either tick or delete the particular item).  Top marks for a free offering!
